text: "Trying" is a song written by Billy Vaughn and performed by The Hilltoppers. It reached #5 on the Cashbox chart and #7 on the U.S. pop chart in 1952. The single ranked #29 on Billboard's Year-End top 30 singles of 1952. ==Other charting versions== *Ella Fitzgerald released a version of the song, #22 on the U.S. pop chart in 1952. *The Hilltoppers released a version of the song in the UK, #30 on the UK Singles chart in 1956. *Vaughn released an instrumental version of the song, #77 on the U.S. pop chart in 1958. ==Other versions== *Grady Martin and His Slew Foot Five released a version of the song as a single in 1952, but it did not chart. *Todd Rhodes Orchestra released a version of the song as a single in 1952, but it did not chart. *Timi Yuro released a version of the song on her 1961 album Hurt!!!!!!! *LaVern Baker released a version of the song on her 1963 album See See Rider. *The Four Lads released a version of the song on their 1963 album Oh, Happy Day. *Bobby Vinton released a version of the song on his 1964 album There! I've Said It Again. *Bob Gutman featuring The Ink Spots and Whistling Joe released a version of the song as a single in 1968, but it did not chart. *Rosco Gordon released a version of the song on his 1998 compilation album Bootin' (The Best of RPM Years). *Texas Tornados released a version of the song on their 2001 live album The Complete Live at the Limo Sessions! ==References== Category:1952 songs Category:1952 singles Category:1956 singles Category:1958 singles Category:1968 singles Category:Ella Fitzgerald songs Category:LaVern Baker songs Category:The Four Lads songs Category:Bobby Vinton songs Category:The Ink Spots songs Category:Dot Records singles Category:Decca Records singles Category:King Records (United States) singles
title: Trying (song)
